phrases.usage: Use this phrase to establish the time period and introduce a specific past event or habit.
phrases.example: When I was a child, I spent my summers in the countryside because my grandparents owned a small farm there.

phrases.usage: Use this to explain the specific reason why a particular memory remains significant or vivid in your mind.
phrases.example: I remember it because the experience taught me the importance of patience, so I value that lesson today.

phrases.usage: Use this to describe the specific circumstances or limitations of the past compared to the present.
phrases.example: Back then, we did not possess smartphones, so we interacted with each other more frequently in person.

phrases.usage: Use this to contrast modern habits or current technology with how things functioned during your childhood.
phrases.example: These days, technology dominates our daily routines, whereas my childhood involved more physical activities.

phrases.usage: Use this to describe the emotional response or reflection that the memory triggers in your current life.
phrases.example: It makes me feel accomplished because I managed to overcome a difficult challenge at a very young age.

phrases.usage: Use this to articulate the moral lesson or practical skill you acquired from a past experience.
phrases.example: One thing I learned was how to collaborate with others effectively because we had to build a treehouse together.

phrases.usage: Use this to provide geographical or environmental context for the event you are describing.
phrases.example: It happened in a small coastal village, so the sound of the ocean always triggers that specific memory.

keyVocabulary.definition: A sentimental longing or wistful affection for a period in the past.
The act of remembering or calling to mind a specific event or piece of information.
Producing powerful feelings or strong, clear images in the mind.
Sufficiently great or important to be worthy of attention or notice.
The capacity to have an effect on the character, development, or behavior of someone.
